attributes.action: Fine MP’s 50% of their salary who actively work to reverse the EU referendum.
attributes.background:
The majority of people voted to leave the EU MP’s whom are now required to help the country move forward have rather focused their attention on overturning the biggest democratic mandate in the history of U.K. politics. 
MPs planning or working to keep the UK in the EU should lose 50% of their wage

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
